common.tagline: Remove watermarks from your images with clear.photo.

cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to analyze our traffic. Please accept to help us improve our website.

intro.welcome: Welcome to Gravura Poderosa LDA ("we," "us," or "our"), a company incorporated in Portugal with the fiscal number 517517787. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our image watermark removal tool (the "Tool"), located at clear.photo.
intro.agreement: By accessing or using the Tool, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to all the Terms, do not use the Tool.

contractual.title: 1.1 Contractual Relationship
contractual.text: By accessing or using the Tool, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms, as well as our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated by reference.

eligibility.title: 1.2 Eligibility
eligibility.text: You may not use the Tool if you are not legally eligible to form a binding contract under applicable laws, or if your use of the Tool is prohibited by any applicable laws or regulations.

updates.title: 2.1 Updates
updates.text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to our website unless otherwise indicated.

notification.title: 2.2 Notification
notification.text: We will provide notice of any material changes (e.g., via a prominent statement on our homepage or by email). Your continued use of the Tool after the effective date of any updated Terms constitutes your acceptance of the changes.

description.title: 3. Description, Responsible Use, and Scope of the Tool

responsibleUse.title: 3.1 Responsible Use: Fostering AI Advancements
responsibleUse.text: Our Tool is designed to facilitate the removal of watermarks from images in ways that support scientific research, educational pursuits, and the development of new technologies. We encourage users to harness this Tool as a resource for advancing artificial intelligence (AI)—particularly in image processing, machine learning, and computer vision. Through responsible and ethical usage:

items.title: Research & Collaboration
items.text: You may use the Tool to prototype innovative approaches in AI, explore open-source libraries, and collaborate on academic or community-driven projects.

items.title: AI Evolution
items.text: We believe imagery systems have the potential to drive the artificialization of intelligence in a similar transformative manner as language technologies have shaped human-computer interactions. By combining visual and linguistic capabilities, we can extend the boundaries of AI to mirror the analytical and creative aspects of human intellect.

items.title: Ethical Considerations
items.text: You are encouraged to abide by ethical principles in AI research, including respect for data privacy, avoidance of biases, and transparency about your usage of this Tool.

scientificUse.title: 3.2 Exclusive for Scientific and Development Purposes
scientificUse.text: The Tool is offered exclusively for non-commercial, scientific, experimental, and developmental uses. By using this Tool, you agree to:

items.title: Avoid Commercial Exploitation
items.text: You shall not use or modify any output or processed images derived from the Tool for direct or indirect commercial gain.

items.title: Open Source Engagement
items.text: Where applicable, we encourage contributions to or usage of open-source projects that foster the improvement of AI-related technologies.

items.title: Prohibit Unauthorized Use
items.text: You must not use the Tool to infringe on intellectual property rights or to engage in any activity that violates local or international law.

scientificUse.note: Any use of the Tool outside the scope of scientific, educational, or developmental purposes is strictly prohibited. If you have questions about permissible uses or wish to request permission for commercial usage, please contact us in advance.

lawfulUse.title: 4.1 Lawful Use
lawfulUse.text: You represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary rights and permissions to the content you upload for watermark removal. You agree not to upload any images whose watermark removal would infringe on any party's rights or violate any laws.

prohibitedContent.title: 4.2 Prohibited Content
prohibitedContent.text: You agree not to upload or distribute any content that:
items: Violates applicable laws or regulations, including but not limited to copyright, trademark, or defamation laws.
Contains or promotes hate speech, violence, or illegal activities.
Infringes any intellectual property or proprietary rights of a third party.

accuracy.title: 4.3 Accuracy of Information
accuracy.text: When creating an account or otherwise providing information to us, you agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information.

storage.title: 5.1 24-Hour Storage
storage.text: To manage operational costs and protect user privacy, we store your processed images on our servers for a maximum period of 24 hours after the watermark removal process is completed.

deletion.title: 5.2 Automatic Deletion
deletion.text: After 24 hours, the processed images (and any user-uploaded images) are automatically and irreversibly deleted from our servers.

noRecovery.title: 5.3 No Recovery
noRecovery.text: Once deleted, these images cannot be recovered. We are not liable for any loss you may incur if you fail to download your processed images within the 24-hour window.

intro.text: This Personal Data Disclaimer governs your use of the watermark removal tool (the "Tool") operated by Gravura Poderosa LDA ("we," "us," "our"), Fiscal Number (NIF): 517517787, located at clear.photo. It supplements our Terms of Service and clarifies our strict no-personal-data policy regarding uploads.

1.title: Non-Personal Content Only
1.text: Our Tool is intended exclusively for images without any personal data.

2.title: Prohibited Uploads
2.text: Do not upload images containing faces, names, identification numbers, or any sensitive information (e.g., medical, financial, or location data).

dataController.title: 2. You Are the Data Controller (If You Upload Personal Data)

1.title: Your Responsibility
1.text: If, in violation of this Disclaimer, you upload personal data, you become the "data controller" under GDPR or other applicable data protection laws.

2.title: No Guarantees from Us
2.text: We provide no support, assurance, or legal compliance for personal data processing. You must satisfy all privacy, consent, and transparency obligations.

userRepresentations.title: 3. User Representations & Warranties
userRepresentations.intro: By using our Tool, you represent and warrant that:

1.title: Filtering/Anonymization
1.text: You have verified or anonymized your images so they do not contain personal data.

2.title: No Automated Unsupervised Uploads
2.text: You will not use bots or scripts to upload unverified images en masse.

3.title: Lawful Use
3.text: You will comply with all laws, including GDPR and copyright regulations, and accept full liability if your uploads violate these rules.

1.title: Technical Process Only
1.text: We only provide an automated function to remove watermarks. We have no means to identify, filter, or handle personal data.

2.title: No Detection or Reporting Mechanisms
2.text: We do not maintain any automated systems to detect or signal personal data, nor do we produce logs or reports that might facilitate a data controller's GDPR-related due diligence. We also do not implement specific safety features designed to protect personal data.

3.title: No Liability for Personal Data
3.text: If personal data appears in uploaded images, we are neither a GDPR "controller" nor able to offer any compliance guarantees. You are solely responsible for all regulatory, legal, or privacy obligations if you choose to upload personal data despite these warnings.

1.title: Policy Violation
1.text: Uploading personal data violates this Disclaimer and possibly our Terms of Service.

2.title: Investigation & Consequences
2.text: If we learn of personal data uploads, we may investigate and, if needed, block or terminate your access to the Tool.

1.text: We disclaim all warranties related to personal data usage, including any implied fitness for GDPR or privacy law compliance.

2.text: We are not liable for any legal, regulatory, or reputational consequences arising from your uploads of personal data.

complaints.title: 7. Making Complaints or Reporting Unauthorized Use

1.title: Suspected Unauthorized Processing
1.text: If you believe your image was processed through our Tool without your authorization, or if you suspect that personal data has been uploaded or processed in violation of this Disclaimer, please contact us at:

2.text: We will investigate any complaints or reports promptly and, if necessary, take appropriate measures (e.g., removing the content, blocking the user, or involving legal authorities).

1.text: We may update this Disclaimer at any time. If changes are significant, we will notify you (e.g., via our homepage or email).

2.text: Continued use of the Tool after any updates constitutes your acceptance of the revised Disclaimer.

hero.title: Remove watermarks from your images automatically with AI.
hero.subtitle: clear.photo is the fastest, cheapest, and most advanced watermark remover you'll ever need.

showcase.title: Check out the results
showcase.subtitle: Our AI does the heavy lifting. Seamlessly remove text, logos, or any unwanted overlay from your pictures.

primaryFeatures.title: The features your business needs to eliminate watermarks for good.
primaryFeatures.subtitle: Whether you're a photographer or a social media manager, let our AI handle the cleanup so you can focus on creativity.

features.title: Automatic Watermark Removal
features.description: With our advanced AI, wipe off watermarks instantly. Just upload your file, and let clear.photo handle the rest.

features.title: Manual/Guided Erase
features.description: For tricky overlays, our guided removal tool helps you remove watermarks precisely—perfect for delicate logos.

features.title: Object Removal
features.description: Got extra elements cluttering your photo? Delete logos, text, or unwanted objects for a flawless finish.

features.title: API Integration
features.description: Integrate our watermark remove solution into your workflow. Bulk removal, e-commerce listings, or social media campaigns—our API has you covered.

secondaryFeatures.title: Simplify the process of removing watermarks and logos.
secondaryFeatures.subtitle: We believe in making your life easier, not harder. That's why clear.photo helps you clean up images seamlessly.

features.name: High-Quality Results
features.description: Our AI preserves the original photo's resolution. Even when you clear watermark text or remove a logo, the outcome looks natural.

features.name: Bulk Processing
features.summary: Save time with automated batch removal.
features.description: Managing multiple images? Our system handles large sets of photos in one go, so you can focus on creative tasks.

features.name: Multi-Platform Access
features.summary: Works on desktop, mobile, and via API.
features.description: No matter where you are or what device you use, clear.photo is here. Speed, consistency, and convenience—right at your fingertips.

callToAction.title: Get started today
callToAction.subtitle: Sign up for clear.photo and discover how easy it is to remove unwanted overlays. Reclaim your photos and keep your audience engaged with fresh visuals.

testimonials.title: Trusted by photographers, designers, and brands everywhere.
testimonials.subtitle: Our watermark remover has turned skeptics into believers. Read why people are raving about clear.photo.

testimonials.content: clear.photo made removing Shutterstock watermarks a breeze. My marketing materials look so clean now!
I needed to erase a logo from a picture for my website design. clear.photo worked like a charm, and the final result was flawless.
I can finally delete watermarks in bulk—something Photoshop alone couldn't handle effectively. clear.photo is a time-saver.
As a freelance photographer, I often see my original images watermarked by others. clear.photo makes it easy to get rid of them fast!
The best free watermark remover I've tried yet. Surprised by how well the AI reconstructs the background behind the text.
We've integrated clear.photo's API into our platform to automatically remove watermarks from photo submissions. Customers love the clean, professional look.

pricing.title: Simple pricing, for everyone.
pricing.subtitle: From casual users to enterprise-level clients, our watermark remover fits your needs and budget perfectly.

manual.description: Manual watermark removal with precision tools

contact.text: Need more credits? Contact our sales team for custom enterprise plans with additional benefits and priority support.

faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.subtitle: Looking for more details about how to remove a logo from a picture or how to clear watermarks effectively? We have answers.

questions.question: How does your watermark remover actually work?
questions.answer: Our AI analyzes the region around the watermark, reconstructs the background, and seamlessly cleans up the image.

questions.question: Will the final image quality be affected?
questions.answer: Our technology preserves resolution and color accuracy. In most cases, you won't notice any difference besides the watermark disappearing.

questions.question: Do you support bulk or batch removal?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Our higher-tier plans offer bulk removal, and the Enterprise plan even removes unlimited watermarks with no daily cap.

questions.question: Can I remove Shutterstock or Getty Images watermarks?
questions.answer: Yes. clear.photo can eliminate any watermark, but please ensure you have the legal right to remove a watermark before doing so.

questions.question: Is there a mobile app to remove watermarks?
questions.answer: Yes! clear.photo works great on mobile browsers and we're developing a dedicated app to help you remove a watermark on the go.

questions.question: How accurate is the manual removal?
questions.answer: Manual removal provides precise control. You can highlight exactly which parts of the watermark need erasing, especially for complex overlays.

questions.question: How do I integrate the API for enterprise workflows?
questions.answer: Our Enterprise plan includes full API documentation. We'll guide you through authentication, request parameters, and bulk endpoint usage.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes, new accounts get free tokens to remove or clean unwanted text from images. Sign up to get started instantly.

questions.question: How can I remove a logo from a picture if it's large?
questions.answer: Our advanced AI can handle logos of all sizes, whether it's a subtle watermark or a big overlay. Just upload your file and choose the removal mode.
